name: Abra Click (Trial Version)
description:
Abra Click is a marvel of the digital age, a powerful new piece of software able to fix computer problems with a single click of the mouse. Abra Click fixes all kinds of issues, viruses and even pesky legal documents; Abra Click will watch your files to make sure they're safe. It's so easy, it's criminalistic!

Note: The mouse is known to connect to things, seemingly at random. Users are asked to ignore this.

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021, by JUSTCAMH
Music by ClockMaker
Sounds from all over the interconnected web (CC-0)
